activities:
We collect personal information when a user creates an account through our website's services; subscribes to our newsletter; participates in feedback forms; purchases a product through the website; or receives customer or technical support. 
To create an account on the website, we require users to provide certain information to create a profile, including their name, email address, password, mailing address, and phone number. Providing additional information beyond what is required to create an account, such as a photo or birthdate, is entirely optional, but enables a user to gain more from the website's services.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data of all website users that provide the Company with personal data (those that create an account or make a purchase through the website) includes manually process data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
